attributes.action: John Bercow must be replaced following flouting of parliamentary procedures.
attributes.additional_details: The Public can’t trust in the Parliamentary system if the procedures and rules are not followed, John Bercow on several occasions has flouted the rules....
attributes.background: John Bercow is required to be neutral in all aspects of his post, on  several occasions shown bias one way or another, the latest being the overruling of advice from a senior clerk over amendments to a non amendable motion in the HOC. This behaviour cannot be allowed continue as it breeds mistrust.

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP, including the Speaker, would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
